sentence: Thursday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index reaching a historical high.
The index closed at 7,823.92 up 107.31 for the day.
The index had a previous high 7781.51457 on 06/20/2018.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 2.18 billion.
Advancers stocks led declining by 1.43 to 1 ratio.
There were 1756 advancers and 1226 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 87 stocks reached a 52 week high and 30 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed up 1.69% for the day; a total of 122.27 points.
Broadcom Inc. ( AVGO ) had the largest percent change down (-13.74%) while CA Inc. ( CA ) had the largest percent change gain rising 18.65%.
The Dow Jones index closed up .91% for the day; a total of 224.44 points.
Procter & Gamble Company (The) ( PG ) had the largest percent change down (-.34%) while Cisco Systems, Inc. ( CSCO ) had the largest percent change gain rising 2.37%.
